long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TaskSparrow is a Google Chrome extension that automatically refreshes a web page and alerts you with a sound notification when there's task to rate. Stay updated without manual refreshes!

Set the refresh interval and TaskSparrow will handle the rest. Whether it's monitoring live feeds, tracking changes, or waiting for updates, TaskSparrow keeps you in the loop.

Receive sound alerts when the acquire button appears on the page. No more constant checking. TaskSparrow notifies you when it matters most.

Effortlessly stay updated with TaskSparrow. Enhance your browsing experience today!
